tool_description: Get the the stocks informations using a REST API simple and free.
name: Stocks
title: Stocks

api_list.name: Get the stock history by exchange code and stock code
api_list.description: Get the stock history by exchange code and stock code.

api_list.name: Get the current stock by exchange code and stock code
api_list.description: Get the current stock by exchange code and stock code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stocks73.p.rapidapi.com/v1/stocks/NASDAQ/GOOG"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocks73.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stocks73.p.rapidapi.com/v1/stocks/{exchangecode}/{stockcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stocks73.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the stock history by code

api_list.description: Get the current stock by code.
